participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Determined and ambitious, she is focused on her goals and has a strong desire to succeed.
participant_1.background: my family has raised horses for generations. i want to be a lawyer. i was raised on a horse farm. i am from a small town. i dream of moving to the city.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Energetic and sociable, he enjoys fitness and meeting new people, often looking for ways to stay active.
participant_2.background: i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i go to the gym regularly. i have short hair. eating is something i do when i'm bored.
